contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road |province=QC |type=QC |route=344 |maint=[[Transports Québec]] |map=Route 344-QC.png |established= |decommissioned= |alternate_name= |length_km =130.5 |length_round =1 |length_ref=<ref>Ministère des transports, "Distances routières", page 99-100, Les Publications du Québec, 2005</ref> |direction_a=West |direction_b=East |terminus_a= {{jct|state=QC|A|50}} in '''[[Grenville-sur-la-Rouge, Quebec|Grenville-sur-la-Rouge]]''' |terminus_b= {{jct|state=QC|QC|343}} in '''[[L'Assomption, Quebec|L'Assomption]]''' |previous_type=QC |previous_route=343 |next_type=QC |next_route=345 |cities= [[Oka, Quebec|Oka]], [[Pointe-Calumet, Quebec|Pointe-Calumet]], [[Deux-Montagnes, Quebec|Deux-Montagnes]], [[Saint-Eustache, Quebec|Saint-Eustache]], [[Boisbriand, Quebec|Boisbriand]], [[Bois-des-Filion, Quebec|Bois-des-Filion]], [[Terrebonne, Quebec|Terrebonne]], [[Charlemagne, Quebec|Charlemagne]], [[Repentigny, Quebec|Repentigny]], [[L'Assomption, Quebec|L'Assomption]] |junction={{jct|state=QC|QC|148}} in Grenville-sur-le-Rouge <br> {{jct|state=QC|QC|327}} in Saint-Andre-D'Argenteuil <br> {{jct|state=QC|A|640}} in Pointe-Calumet<br> {{jct|state=QC|QC|148}} in Saint-Eustache <br> {{jct|state=QC|A|13|A|15|TCH}} in Boisbriand <br> {{jct|state=QC|QC|117}} in Rosemère <br> {{jct|state=QC|QC|335}} in Bois-des-Filion <br> {{jct|state=QC|A|25|QC|125|QC|337|A|40}} in Terrebonne <br> {{jct|state=QC|A|640}} in Charlemagne <br> {{jct|state=QC|QC|341}} in L'Assomption <br> {{jct|state=QC|QC|339}} in L'Assomption |}} '''Route 344''' is an east/west highway on the north shore of the [[Ottawa River]] in [[Quebec]], [[Canada]]. Its western terminus is in [[Grenville-sur-la-Rouge, Quebec|Grenville-sur-la-Rouge]] at the junction of [[Quebec Autoroute 50|Autoroute 50]], and its eastern terminus is in [[L'Assomption, Quebec|L'Assomption]] at the junction of [[Quebec Route 343|Route 343]]. It follows the [[Ottawa River]] from Grenville-sur-la-Rouge to [[Saint-André-d'Argenteuil, Quebec|Saint-André-d'Argenteuil]], where it follows the [[Lake of Two Mountains|Lac des Deux Montagnes]] up until [[Deux-Montagnes, Quebec|Deux-Montagnes]], where it follows the [[Rivière des Mille Îles]] until [[Repentigny, Quebec|Repentigny]], where it follows the [[Rivière l'Assomption]] until L'Assomption. ==Municipalities along Route 344== * [[Grenville-sur-la-Rouge, Quebec|Grenville-sur-la-Rouge]] * [[Grenville, Quebec|Grenville]] * [[Brownsburg-Chatham, Quebec|Brownsburg-Chatham]] * [[Saint-André-d'Argenteuil, Quebec|Saint-André-d'Argenteuil]] * [[Saint-Placide, Quebec|Saint-Placide]] * [[Kanesatake, Quebec|Kanesatake]] * [[Oka, Quebec|Oka]] * [[Saint-Joseph-du-Lac, Quebec|Saint-Joseph-du-Lac]] * [[Pointe-Calumet, Quebec|Pointe-Calumet]] * [[Sainte-Marthe-sur-le-Lac, Quebec|Sainte-Marthe-sur-le-Lac]] * [[Deux-Montagnes, Quebec|Deux-Montagnes]] * [[Saint-Eustache, Quebec|Saint-Eustache]] * [[Boisbriand, Quebec|Boisbriand]] * [[Rosemère, Quebec|Rosemère]] * [[Lorraine, Quebec|Lorraine]] * [[Bois-des-Filion, Quebec|Bois-des-Filion]] * [[Terrebonne, Quebec|Terrebonne]] * [[Charlemagne, Quebec|Charlemagne]] * [[Repentigny, Quebec|Repentigny]] (''[[Le Gardeur, Quebec|Le Gardeur]]'') * [[L'Assomption, Quebec|L'Assomption]] ==See also== * [[List of Ministry of Transportation)] {{fr icon}} *
